document_data.name: Presper Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Presper Street''' was a winding street in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This road ran from east to west, stretching from [[Ship Street (Waterdeep)|Ship Street]] to an intersection with [[Snail Street]] and [[Shrimp Alley]], formerly known as Shrimp Street. At its midpoint, the street acted as the northern terminus of the [[Street of Six Casks]].

Notable Locations.Lanternmaker Zorth Ulmaril|Lanternmaking: A [[lantern]] shop that was owned by [[Zorth Ulmaril]].
